messages.content: What makes Pacagen’s product different?

Our products use the latest developments in biotechnology to provide you with a safe, pure, and environmentally-friendly way to manage your allergies. Unlike allergy pills or shots, our proprietary proteins, WhiskerBlock and EnviroBlock, directly deactivate allergens in your home to prevent them getting in touch with you. This technology is safe, effective, easy to use, and non-invasive for you and your pets!
What are allergens?

Allergens are harmless proteins that can trigger allergic reactions when people are exposed to them. The severity and duration of allergies can vary widely depending on the person, how much of the allergen they're exposed to, and other environmental factors.


For example, cats produce a protein called Fel d 1, which is the main cause of cat allergies for most people. Our neutralizing spray is specially formulated to deactivate Fel d 1, and we've conducted extensive testing to confirm that this is the only deactivation our WhiskerBlock Alpha is designed to perform, ensuring its effectiveness and safety.
What is Pacagen’s technology?

Pacagen’s allergen-neutralizing technology works like a tiny version of an antibody—about one-tenth the size! Instead of entering your body like pills or allergy shots, it works by deactivating allergens in your environment. We’ve done extensive research to make sure it works quickly, effectively, and is safe for both people and pets. Similar types of technology are also widely used by scientists around the world, so you can feel confident in its safety!
Is there a product that covers cat, dog, and dust allergies?

Right now, we offer separate sprays for cat, dog, and dust allergens, each designed to target a specific allergen effectively. If you're unsure of where to start, we recommend you try the spray for the allergen that you feel affects you the most. You can always add others later if needed to find the best combination for your home. Please reach out to support@pacagen.com if you're unsure and we'd be happy to give input based on your specific situation and needs!
Are your products safe for pets?

Absolutely! Many of our team members are fellow pet parents, so we care about furry members’ well-being just as much. All our products are non-toxic and safe for both pets and human, and our research team conducted dozen of studies — accumulating thousands of data point — to ensure the safety and effectiveness of our products. In the same time, our products are free from harsh chemicals and formulated to be fast-drying, so they are also convenient and safe to use on your furniture!
Are your products safe for pregnant people and babies?

While we haven't conducted formal studies on pregnant individuals or babies due to ethical guidelines, we recognize the importance of protecting these sensitive groups from allergens. That’s why our sprays are made with only ingredients considered safe to use around them. Since our products are applied topically and not absorbed into the body, they should be safe for use in these situations.
Can I mix the powder with water instead of the stabilizing solution?

Definitely NOT! The stabilizing solution is formulated to maximize the effectiveness and stability of our WhiskerBlock and EnviroBlock proteins. Mixing with water (either tap water or distilled water) will significantly shorten the shelf life and reduce their effectiveness, and we strongly recommend mixing the powder with our stabilizing solutions.
Does your product contain other allergens?
No, as we emphasize the safety and effectiveness of our products, No common allergens were added to our product, and we specifically formulated it to be safe to use around humans and pets.
Are there environmental impacts of the products?

We take pride in the fact that our products are designed with environmental consciousness in mind. Whenever possible, we use biological ingredients that have no long-term environmental impact. In fact, 99% of the ingredients in the powder are biodegradable! We also ensure that all of our partners share a similar commitment to environmental responsibility.
How does the spray work?

Our allergen neutralizing sprays, unlike other products in the market, are unique in its technology. Instead of introducing something to your body, we took advantage of alpaca-inspired protein technology that resembles a miniaturized antibody. Similar to the antibody in our body, our proprietary protein WhiskerBlock and EnviroBlock, recognize and deactivate allergens in the environment to prevent them from triggering your allergy reactions.
What are stabilizing solutions and allergen neutralizing powders in the pack?

The allergen-neutralizing powder is most effective when dissolved in our specially formulated stabilizing solution, which also helps preserve the shelf life of the active ingredient, WhiskerBlock Alpha. We strongly advise against mixing the powder with any other liquid (including distilled or tap water), as this can compromise both the effectiveness and stability of the final spray.
Is the spray safe to use around pets and furniture?

Absolutely! Many of our team members are fellow pet parents, so we care about furry members’ well-being just as much. All our products are non-toxic and safe for both pets and human, and our research team conducted dozen of studies — accumulating thousands of data point — to ensure the safety and effectiveness of our products. In the same time, our products are free from harsh chemicals and formulated to be fast-drying, so they are also convenient and safe to use on your furniture!
How long do I need to use the spray to see results?

Allergy responses can vary significantly from person to person. While many of our customers notice improvement within hours, others report results within a few days of using the spray. You may adjust the application frequency for optimal results. For best effectiveness, we recommend applying the spray regularly to prevent allergen buildup.
Does the spray have a scent? Do you have unscented or fragrance-free sprays?

Our WhiskerBlock & EnviroBlock proteins have a natural scent - just like your protein powders carry a distinct smell. We’ve added a very small amount of naturally extracted lavender and morning glory fragrance to balance it out. Most customers say the scent is barely noticeable after spraying. If you're sensitive to fragrance, we recommend trying our fragrance-free (natural) version instead, which is only available if you specifically request it by contacting support@pacagen.com (due to limited inventory). Note that the natural available for our Cat and Dust allergen neutralizing sprays. *Natural versions available in the US only.
How does the food topper work and can I replace the spray with food topper?

The food topper contains the same active ingredient—WhiskerBlock Alpha—as the spray. When ingested, WhiskerBlock Alpha works by deactivating Fel d 1 proteins in a cat’s saliva and dander, helping reduce the amount of allergen shed into the environment.
While the food topper addresses the allergen at its source, it does not neutralize allergens that have already accumulated in the surroundings as the spray does. Therefore, the two products are not interchangeable, and we strongly recommend using them together to minimize active allergens and maximize the overall effectiveness of WhiskerBlock Alpha.
Is the cat food topper safe for cats?

Absolutely! Many of our team members are fellow pet parents, so we care about furry members’ well-being just as much. All our products are non-toxic and safe for both pets and human, and our research team conducted dozen of studies — accumulating thousands of data point — to ensure the safety and effectiveness of our products.
I accidentally feed more than ⅛ teaspoon to my cats, what should I do?

No worries at all! Your cat’s safety is our top priority. Our food topper is carefully formulated with food-grade, cat-safe ingredients, so even if your cat gets a little extra, it won't cause any harm. In fact, you're welcome to increase the amount as needed based on your cat’s needs and your comfort level. We understand how important peace of mind is when caring for your furry family members, and we’re here to support you every step of the way.
How long does it take to see results from the topper?

Allergy responses can vary widely between individuals, but many of our customers notice a significant improvement within two weeks of using the food topper as directed. When used with our allergen-neutralizing spray—which deactivates allergens in the surrounding environment—results may appear even sooner.
How long does one jar of food topper last?
The Cat Food Topper should last about 4 weeks, although this may vary depending on the amount you serve to your cat.
I have multiple cats, how do I feed the food topper?

For optimal results, we recommend feeding the topper separately to ensure each cat receives ⅛ teaspoon per meal. Alternatively, you can offer the topper directly as a treat, which can make it easier to monitor each cat’s intake.
Can I use the food topper with any cat food or prescription diets?

Our Cat Food Topper is crafted with high-quality, highly palatable ingredients, making it easy to blend with all types of cat food. That said, we understand some cats may have specific dietary needs. If you have any concerns, feel free to contact us at support@pacagen.com for detailed ingredient information, and consult your veterinarian for tailored dietary advice. We're here to help you make the best choice for your cat’s health and well-being.
My cats have specific conditions. Is the topper safe for them?

Cats with certain health conditions may require strict dietary restrictions. For more information, please feel free to email us at support@pacagen.com. Additionally, consult your veterinarian for personalized guidance tailored to your cat’s specific needs.
How does the subscription work?

By signing up for our Autoship & Save subscriptions, you’re guaranteed to receive discounted rates on your first purchase, and every additional renewal from that point as well! Every few weeks, you’ll receive a refill for your initial purchase, delivered straight to your doorstep. You don’t have to worry about any of the transactional or logistic headaches — we’ll handle all of that for you!


You’ll also get access to your own subscription profile, through which you can make whatever edits you’d like.
How can I pause or cancel my subscription?

You can make any updates to your subscription status directly through your subscription profile! Simply click the link in the reminder emails we send from support@pacagen.com before your next renewal. Alternatively, you can email us directly at support@pacagen.com and our team will help you manage your subscription!


That being said, before you cancel your subscription, please reach out to our team to let us know what’s causing you to make this decision. We’re committed to earning your continued support, and will gladly have a transparent conversation with you to make things right! Who knows, we may even throw in a little extra something just for you…
How can I view the details or make edits to my subscription?

You can make edits to your subscription directly through your subscription profile! You should have received email notifications from support@pacagen.com about your subscription when you originally signed up. Simply click on the link in those emails to view your subscription profile. Alternatively, you can email us directly at support@pacagen.com and our team will help you make whatever changes you’d like, including:
* Changing shipping address
* Changing payment method
* Delaying next shipments
* Adding/removing/changing items
* Applying discounts on next shipments
I tried to cancel my subscription, but my subscription was renewed anyway. What now?

As a rule of thumb, we make sure to always send out email reminders before your subscription is about to renew — to help prevent issues such as this. Regardless, please rest assured that our team’s more than happy to work with you on this. Please contact us at support@pacagen.com and someone from our team will do whatever they can to help!
How do I make changes to my order?

Whether we can make changes to your order depends on whether it’s already been fulfilled or shipped out yet. If you haven’t yet received email confirmation that your order has been fulfilled or shipped, please reach out to support@pacagen.com as soon as possible — our team will do what we can to make those changes for you. These changes may include:
* Changing shipping address
* Changing payment method
* Adding/removing/changing items — although this would require us to re-invoice you for the difference


That being said, if your order’s already been fulfilled or shipped (i.e., if your order has already been passed onto the shipping carrier), we are no longer able to make any changes.
How do I cancel my order?

Whether or not we can hold/cancel your order depends on whether it’s already been shipped out or not. If you haven’t yet received email confirmation that your order has been fulfilled or shipped, please reach out to support@pacagen.com as soon as possible — our team can pull the order and issue you a full refund. However, if your order’s already been fulfilled or shipped (i.e., if your order has already been passed onto the shipping carrier), we unfortunately can not make any changes or initiate any refunds.
I do not want my order, how do I return it?

Unless you purchased with our Try Before You Buy plan, we do not accept returns for our products. If you are enrolled in our Try Before You Buy plan and wish to initiate a return, please email us at support@pacagen.com to begin the process.
It’s not working for me, how do I get a refund?

We’re sorry to hear that our product didn’t meet your expectations, but rest assured — we’re committed to doing right by our customers. Please reach out to support@pacagen.com to start the refund process. Please keep in mind that in order for our team to approve your refund for efficacy reasons, you must meet certain criteria for length of time used. You’ll also be asked to include very detailed notes of how you used the product week-by-week, so be prepared! Simply copying and pasting results week by week is not sufficient. For more information on our refund process, please visit https://pacagen.com/pages/our-guarantee.
My cat or myself had an adverse reaction due to the product, how do I get a refund?

Although we don’t take returns (unless you’re enrolled in our Try Before You Buy plan), we treat cases like this very seriously. Please reach out to support@pacagen.com and we’ll get this sorted out as quickly as possible.


As a brand, we commit ourselves to the safety of our customers — in fact, we jump through many hurdles to test our products both in vitro and in vivo to make sure of this. However, we also understand that we can’t anticipate every situation, especially if there are other variables at play. We apologize for any inconvenience or disturbance you’ve experienced as a result, and we assure you that we’re doing everything we can to continue improving.
What is Try Before You Buy?

This is a special program we offer that allows customers to give our products a try before committing to the payment! After enrolling in the program, you’ll have 4 weeks to trial the product. Within that trial period, if you decide that you don’t want it anymore then you can return it back to us and we’ll guarantee you won’t pay a dime. You’ll only be charged if you decide to keep the product!
How do I ship the product back to you to get my Try Before You Buy guarantee?

If it’s still within your trial period window (within 4 weeks of the day you received it), you can reach out to support@pacagen.com to begin the return process. We’ll require you to provide proof that you did indeed ship it back to us.
What is the shelf life of the spray?

When the components (Neutralizing Powder and Stabilizing Solution) are unmixed, they’re individually very stable — at least for multiple years. However, after the components are mixed together, the spray will only remain effective for up to 2 months (if kept refrigerated). This shelf life reflects the activity of our proprietary WhiskerBlock/EnviroBlock ingredient, which are special proteins that neutralize allergens. As with most proteins, they grow less stable once dissolved in solution.
Will using the spray damage my furniture?

Rest assured, we’ve rigorously tested our product to be stain-free and easy on the furniture. As a carrier, most of the mixed formulation is distilled water, so it'll be as if you're applying a mist of water on the couch. In general, as long as it's done in moderation, there shouldn't be any problems! As of today, we have tens of thousands of customers, and none of them have complained about the spray causing damage to their furniture.
How long will one bottle of spray last?

One bottle of our Starter Pack typically lasts around 4 weeks, assuming you're using it routinely every couple days. Of course, how much you use depends on how severe your symptoms are and how much relief you need! If you find yourself running out, we’d highly recommend you enroll in our Autoship & Save plan, which regularly ships you refills straight to your doorstep (for a discounted price).
Can I heat up the spray or use it in a mister/humidifier?

We strongly discourage putting our products into devices that heat it up (such as most misters and humidifiers). Our active ingredients are special proteins, which gives our formulation its allergy-reducing properties. As with any protein, too much heat may cause damage and reduce its effectiveness.
Can the Cat, Dog, or Dust sprays be used together at the same time?

Yes, there should be no problems using them at the same time. However, to give the spray a chance to be fully effective, we’d recommend using one spray first and then waiting for it to dry a bit before using the other ones.
What ingredients are in the Allergen Neutralizing Sprays?

Each Allergen Neutralizing Spray Starter Pack consists of a custom spray bottle, a Stabilizing Solution, and the respective Allergen Neutralizing Powder (cat, dog, or dust). The powder contains our proprietary ingredient, which is most effective when mixed together with the solution we provide.


The ingredients in the Powder:
* Pacagen’s proprietary ingredient — WhiskerBlock Alpha for cat allergens, WhiskerBlock Beta for dog allergens, or EnviroBlock Alpha for dust allergens
* NaCl
* Glycine
* Leucine
* Morning Glory Scent
* English Lavender Scent
* Sodium Benzoate
* Potassium Sorbate
* Silica


These are the ingredients in the Solution:
* Acetic acid buffer
* Glycerol
* Ethylhexylglycerin
* Phenoxyethanol
* Sodium Chloride
* Glycine
* Leucine
* Distilled water
What are the best practices with the Allergen Neutralizing Sprays to get the best results?

We recommend following a regular routine of spraying every 2-3 days in allergen “hot zones” — places throughout your home that the allergens are most likely to accumulate. For cats and dogs, this is usually your furniture, carpets, bedding, or any other areas that your pets typically hang around and shed their hair. For dust, the “hot zones” are usually places like curtains, carpets, bedding, and vents. Allergens can also be airborne, so spraying in the air is also recommended for all types of allergens. 


For cat and dog allergens, we recommend vacuuming and cleaning surfaces throughout your household before you use the spray. This will expose the allergens that would be otherwise hard to target, allowing for our spray to finish off the job. In addition, many of our customers have reported great results after applying our spray to a pet brush and grooming their cat or dog with it. In contrast, for dust allergens we advise you to clean very cautiously prior to using the spray. This is because aggressively sweeping and dusting may unleash dust allergens into the air, further agitating your sensitivity.


For all the Allergen Neutralizing Sprays, the effectiveness should last for many days with each application, but slowly fades over time. Due to this, consistency is key to seeing the best results! On that note, we’d highly recommend joining our Autoship & Save plan to receive regular shipments straight to your doorstep.
Can I spray this directly on my cat or dog?

Although we generally recommend applying around the household, there are no harmful side effects of spraying on your cat or dog directly. The main issue would be that some pets don't tend to like getting wet — so apply at your own discretion! Alternatively, some of our customers have had a lot of success spraying our product on a hair brush and grooming their pet regularly with it. Not only would this help them shed some allergen-dense hair, but it’d also apply our active ingredient directly to the source of allergens.
Do you sell in retail stores?
At the moment, we only sell our products on our online store pacagen.com or on Amazon. That being said, we’re definitely looking to expand into major retailers across the US in the near future!
Do you ship internationally?

At the moment, we only ship our products to the US and Canada. That being said, we’re actively working on extending our supply chain to other countries. If you don’t live in the US or Canada but you have friends/family that do, we’d recommend shipping our products to them for the time being.
What is the goal of Pacagen?

We're setting a new standard in allergen management.
Our vision is simple: a world where people and pets are no longer separated because of allergens. No more sniffles, watery eyes, or scratchy throats.

Pacagen is committed to building a future where life with our pets is all about love and comfort, without the hassle of allergens – and we’re using the latest developments in biotechnology to do so.
How was Pacagen founded?

Pacagen’s story is personal. The moment our founders, Dr. Evan Zhao and Dr. Siyang Han, met their adorable British Shorthair cat Miaomiao, it was love at first sight.
Unfortunately, the happiness the new kitten brought the young family was quickly clouded by a new obstacle- Siyang’s allergies, which manifested as stuffy sinuses, itchy eyes and asthma symptoms.
Allergy medicine made her drowsy, and other anti-allergen products often weren’t safe for pets.
Eager to keep Miaomiao in the family, Evan looked to his background in biotechnology to engineer a new solution.
Reminded of a special class of proteins that he studied during his PhD, Evan discovered WhiskerBlock proteins, which could be tailor-made to target specific allergens and easily turned into a spray.
The resulting product was our cat allergen neutralizing spray – accessible for anyone with pet allergies, and completely safe for both people and pets!
Can you help check my orders?

You can log into your Pacagen account to check the order status. You could also refer to the shipping confirmation email you received after your purchase. This email contains a tracking link that allows you to monitor your order's progress in real-time. If you haven't received this email or need further assistance, please contact our customer support team at support@pacagen.com. We're here to help ensure you receive your order promptly.
I have not received my orders.

You can log into your Pacagen account to check the order status. You could also refer to the shipping confirmation email you received after your purchase. This email contains a tracking link that allows you to monitor your order's progress in real-time. If you haven't received this email or need further assistance, please contact our customer support team at support@pacagen.com. We're here to help ensure you receive your order promptly.
I want to track my orders.

You can log into your Pacagen account to check the order status. You could also refer to the shipping confirmation email you received after your purchase. This email contains a tracking link that allows you to monitor your order's progress in real-time. If you haven't received this email or need further assistance, please contact our customer support team at support@pacagen.com. We're here to help ensure you receive your order promptly.
Can you update my payment methods?
To update your payment method, please sign up or log into your Pacagen account. You can update your account info there!
I want to change my address.
To update your address, please sign up or log into your Pacagen account. You can update your account info there!
Do your products contain drugs?

No, our products do not contain any drugs and they should be considered as replacement for drugs. Our products help you feel relieved by neutralizing the allergens in the environment, instead of curing your allergies.
Can you products replacement drugs like antihistamines?

No, our products do not contain any drugs and they should be considered as replacement for drugs such as antihistamines. Our products help you feel relieved by neutralizing the allergens in the environment, instead of curing your allergies.
Do your products cure allergies?

No, our products do not contain any drugs and they should be considered as replacement for drugs such as antihistamines. Our products help you feel relieved by neutralizing the allergens in the environment, instead of curing your allergies.
Who are you?
My name is Benjamin, your assistant from Pacagen to answer your questions about us! How can I help today!
